title: 10 SGC Graded T206 Hall of Famers FS: Cobb, Matty...
author: Chris D.

posts.post_title: 10 SGC Graded T206 Hall of Famers FS: Cobb, Matty...
posts.post_content:
Happy New Year! Up for sale are the following cards. Prices are delivered. Accepted forms of payment are Paypal gift, money order and check. First to respond saying "I'll take ____" gets it. Using email works best for me: [url]cdiaz1069@gmail.com[/url]. Click the link in my sig to view scans. If you need scans of backs let me know and I will scan them. Thanks.

Piedmont Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 30 $534
Sovereign Christy Mathewson Dark Cap SGC 40 $415
Piedmont George Davis SGC 40 $81
Piedmont Roger Bresnahan With Bat SGC 30 $58 SOLD
Sovereign Vic Willis Portrait SGC 30 $65
Piedmont Fred Clarke Portrait SGC 50 $117 SOLD
Piedmont Iron Man McGinnity SGC 50 $126
Piedmont Jake Beckley SGC 30 $47
Sweet Caporal Joe Kelley SGC 30 $53
Piedmont Rube Waddell Throwing SGC 40 $112
